title: True according to the short-run Phillips curve

content.question: Which of the following is true according to the short-run Phillips curve?

choices.label: Improvements in technology will increase the level of noncyclical unemployment.
Inflation increases when aggregate demand increases.
Changes in the composition of the labor force may cause higher price levels.
There is no trade-off between unemployment and inflation.

content.answer: Inflation increases when aggregate demand increases.
